meanings.definition: To look at carefully in order to discover something
meanings.sent1: The detective inspects the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent2: The teacher inspects the students' homework to check for mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat inspects every corner of the room, searching for hidden toys.
meanings.sent4: The scientist inspects the data under a microscope, revealing new patterns.
meanings.sent5: The inspector inspects the documents with a magnifying glass, uncovering tiny details.

meanings.definition: To examine or review carefully and critically
meanings.sent1: The quality control team inspects each product before it is shipped.
meanings.sent2: The journalist inspects the article for any errors before publishing.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater inspects the food on his plate, looking for any imperfections.
meanings.sent4: The art critic inspects the painting, analyzing every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor inspects the work of the employees, ensuring high standards are met.
